topics.why: Foundation for critical thinking about evidence in any field — medicine, policy, business, personal decisions.

topics.why: Core critical thinking skill — recognizing flawed reasoning in others and yourself.

topics.why: Applied ecology connecting entomology and plant pathology. Essential for agriculture and food security.
